attributes.action: To reduce pollution by adding signs on train stations to turn off engine while waiting for the trains lines to open
attributes.additional_details:
Train stations all across the UK should have a sign to turn off their engine while waiting for the train lines to open.
This will reduce the amount of air pollution in the air  because turning off  the engines will decrease the amount of carbon dioxide being relased by vehicles.
Also this will save a lot of money for drivers as a result this will decrease the chance of raw materials of finishing quicker.
